entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
